attributes.action: Courts are discriminating against fathers and grandparents rights letting mothers get away with anything
attributes.additional_details: I would like to have the court system surrounding family court reformed i my self and my parents have been seriously let down by the sheriffs In central Scotland letting mothers get away with breaking court orders and not really caring about the best interest for the children or all party's involved. It's high time there was equil rights for all parents.. High tine grandparents were given a voice.. High time sheriffs took these matters as serious as murder or rape because in some cases the abuse that is neglected can lead to ruined life's.. High time this government I helped elect paid me back by helping fathers have access to there children.. High time any parent stopping another from seeing his of her children were punished for doing so without cause.. It's time this country addressed family values And recognised it takes 2 parents to raise a child..
